EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, HEAL'S #LifeHacks is almost here! DETAILS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Grads,
Thanks for signing up to to Hounslow and Ealing's Life Hacks workshop! This email will let you know all the details for the day and what you need to bring.
Being part of #LifeHacks, you will be attending a life hacks and wellbeing workshop to help you manage and deal with stress. This workshop consists of different activities such as meditation, discussions over tea and coffee and welcoming a guest speaker!
Being involved in this social action project means you have earned free tickets for the NCS Action Day celebration event taking place in Conway Hall after your project from 4pm to 8pm! You will be travelling from the workshop to Conway Hall with your mentor.
This project will take place between 1pm to 3pm. Please arrive at Ealing Green Church for 12:50pm so we can start on time. If you are on Youth Board, can you please arrive to the venue at 11:30am
Please bring your oysters and some money to put on them as you will be travelling from Ealing to Holborn for the celebration event.
Address: Ealing Green Church, Ealing, W5 5QT
You will have 2 mentors on the day. Indie - 07469151448 Stephen - 07895825100
These are the numbers you can contact on the day if you need to. If you have any questions regarding the day please free feel to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org
Looking forward to seeing you all there!
The Core Grad Team
